scripts.predist: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/js && touch dist/js/bundle.js
scripts.dist: npm run dist:javascript && npm run dist:styles && npm run dist:html
scripts.watch: concurrent --kill-others "npm run watch:javascript" "npm run watch:styles" "npm run watch:html" "npm run serve"
scripts.watch:styles: nodemon --watch src/style -e scss --exec node-sass src/style/index.scss dist/css/bundle.css --include-path="./node_modules/foundation-sites/scss/"
scripts.watch:html: nodemon --watch src/ -e html --exec cp src/index.html dist/index.html
